news_header: Nordea faces customer dissatisfaction due to recent technical issues, while competitors see an increase in new clients.
news_text: Recently, Nordea has experienced technical disruptions affecting customer services, leading some clients, like Minnamari Dahlberg, to consider switching banks due to concerns over security and reliability. Despite these issues, Nordea denies any significant customer loss, although competitors like Danske Bank report an increase in new customers. Some clients express understanding of the situation, while others criticize Nordea's lack of communication regarding the ongoing problems. Overall, while Nordea struggles with customer trust, other banks are benefiting from the situation.
